text: O te, kotoryye uverovali! Ne vkhodite v doma Proroka, yesli tol'ko vas ne priglasyat na trapezu, no ne dozhidaytes' yeye prigotovleniya (ne prikhodite zaraneye). Yesli zhe vas priglasyat, to vkhodite, a kogda poyedite, to raskhodites' i ne usazhivaytes' dlya razgovorov. Etim vy prichinyayete neudobstvo Proroku. On styditsya vas, no Allakh ne styditsya istiny. Yesli vy prosite u nikh (zhen Proroka) kakuyu-libo utvar', to prosite u nikh cherez zavesu. Tak budet chishche dlya vashikh serdets i ikh serdets. Vam ne podobayet ni obizhat' Poslannika Allakha, ni zhenit'sya na yego zhenakh posle yego smerti. Voistinu, eto yavlyayetsya velikim grekhom pered Allakhom
